name: ft-transcendence-monolithic
description: Monolithic Pong Rush application - Frontend + Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm run build 2>/dev/null || echo 'No backend build script'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'No frontend tests'
